body.name: Lovell & Spring Slim Water Bottle with Neoprene Sleeve – 14oz Flask for Daily Hydration, Travel – Non-BPA Smart Water Bottle Plastic Flask – Stylish and Elegant Design – Includes eBook
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 1 min
features: Stay Hydrated in Style: Whether you’re looking for a practical way of staying hydrated throughout the day, or you simply want to add a classy and elegant note to your outfits, the Lovell & Spring motivational water bottle is definitely a must!

Safety Comes First: Our aesthetic water bottle is made employing premium grade, highly durable materials, with non-BPA food-grade plastic, being easy to clean and designed to last for many years of use. No need to worry about weird tasting plastics interfering with your water!

Sleek and Practical Neoprene Sleeve: Unlike similar products on the market, these cute water bottles include a sleek and modern looking neoprene sleeve with ergonomic easy grip handle, helping preserve the liquid at optimal drinking temperature for longer!

Incredibly Versatile: With a capacity of 14.2oz/420ml, the Lovell & Spring flat water bottle will come in handy for your daily activities, keeping you hydrated at the office, during school hours, while traveling or at home!

Thoughtful Gift for Loved Ones: Order this beautiful travel water bottle for yourself or as a lovely gift choice for a friend, and you can be sure everyone will appreciate it! Actively contribute to a cleaner planet with this reusable water bottle that supports an active and well-balanced lifestyle!
body.description: Lovell & Spring is a trusted, well-established brand that focuses on delivering unique, reasonably priced drinking & hydration accessories meant to make your everyday life easier, while adding a touch of style and functionality to your look. We make sure to employ only high grade materials and carefully tested manufacturers, in order to meet every customer’s rigorous quality expectations. Should you not be 100% happy with your purchase, tell us everything about it and our friendly customer care team will quickly address the situation! 14Oz Slim Water Bottle – Your Daily Companion for A Well-Balanced Lifestyle The Lovell & Spring flask water bottles were designed having in mind the perfect balance between durability and style, motivating you to keep yourself hydrated no matter where the day takes you. Made with non-BPA durable plastic, with a sleek neoprene sleeve included for extra protection and insulation, plus a leakproof design keeping you safe from messy accidents, this flat water bottle will become your loyal companion at the office, school, while traveling or on the go! Not entirely convinced? Here are some of the amazing features of this smart water bottle: 1. Optimal capacity: 14.2oz/420ml; 2. Includes bonus eBook; 3. Modern and stylish design; 4. Leakproof, no weird smells; 5. Non-BPA durable plastic; 6. Includes machine washable insulated neoprene sleeve with easy grip handle; 7. Portable and lightweight, designed for travel; 8. Perfect gift choice for best friend, partner, colleague, sports enthusiasts; 9. Nice ready to gift packaging; 10. Reusable water bottle prevents plastic waste and contributes to a cleaner environment. You’ll fall in love instantly with our high-end motivational water bottle!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this last week. I’ve been looking for this shape bottle for ages. Love the size , slips in my bag without taking up excess space. Great quality, love the feature of the neoprene case. Very happy. Will make the perfect gift too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking bottle with branded sleeve
reviews.reviewText: This is a great bottle, i love the size and look of it! It fits nicely into my bag and it keeps my water cold! Would definitely recommend 👌 also it doesn't leak like others I have tried! Very happy
